TopicTitle: How to make planets with KopernicusTech

Articles.Content: Hi I'm trying to make a star systems mod that just adds stars around the sun, rather than making a black hole in the center of the universe. But some of the stars have masses higher than Kerbol so the sphere of influence for those stars are larger than the semi major axis. I've looked how to change the soi for hours but nothing seems to work please help!

Um, using StarSystems the Sun is called Kerbol. Also, you don't need StarSystems, just install the latest Kopernicus Version and copy the Nemesis config and rename and re-color to your delight.

Also take a look at the mass values of the stars.

I have tried to make three different planets: a moon, a gas giant and an atmosphere planet. none of them worked.

they are'nt in the debug nor the radar center (or whatever)

i was not quite sure what the copernicus config should be called, it is reffered to as YourSystem.cfg in the tutorial?

I really need some help. I have absolutely no idea what I'm doing wrong. I keep getting error messages reading that the textures can't be found but I'm putting them in the right folders and everything (at least, I think so). I'm at a loss and really want to get a second gas giant put into the solar system but have had no luck as of now. What do I do?
This thread is highly outdated. All support question for Kopernicus should be posted in the Kopernicus thread if you want help.

Ok, so can anyone help me? I've done all that and the planet doesnt appear, at all D:

@Kopernicus:AFTER[Kopernicus]

{

 Body

 {

 name = Ursula flightGlobalsIndex = 101

 cacheFile = New\_Horizons/Cache/Ursula.bin

 {

 name = Tylo removePQSMods = PQSLandControl, PQSMod\_AltitudeAlpha,PQSMod\_VertexSimplexHeightAbsolute, PQSMod\_VertexHeightNoise

 }

 Orbit

 {

 referenceBody = Sun inclination = 19.4450137317181

 eccentricity = 1.341

 epoch = 2000

 color = 0.25,0.15,0,41

 }

 Properties

 {

 description = This planet was only dsicovered last year! It's orbit was so inclinded that kerbin was not in the correct part of its orbit to see Ursula. Ursula was the kerbal god of Love and Kindness, given to it for its pink terrain.

 radius = 400000

 geeASL = 1.65

 rotationPeriod = 186969.59375

 rotates = true

 tidallyLocked = true

 initialRotation = 332

 isHomeWorld = false

 timewarpAltitudeLimits = 0 30000 30000 60000 100000 300000 600000 800000

 Biomes

 {

 Biome

 {

 name = Melted Face

 value = 1.0

 color = 1,1,1,1

 }

 Biome

 {

 name = White Flows

 value = 1.0

 color = 1,0,0,1

 }

 {

 name = Ridgelands

 value = 1.0

 color = 0,0,0,1

 }

 Biome

 {

 name = Surface

 value = 1.0

 color = 0,0,1,1

 }

 }

 ScienceValues

 {

 landedDataValue = 24.9

 inSpaceLowDataValue = 21

 inSpaceHighDataValue = 19.7

 recoveryValue = 24.9

 spaceAltitudeThreshold = 100000

 }

 }

 ScaledVersion

 {

 type = Vacuum

 fadeStart = 0

 fadeEnd = 0

 Material

 {

 texture = New\_Horizons/KopernicusFiles/NewHorizonPlanets/Ursula/Textures/Ursula\_color

 normals = New\_Horizons/KopernicusFiles/NewHorizonPlanets/Ursula/Textures/Ursula\_normal

 shininess = 0

 specular = 0.35,0.25,0.15,0

 }

 }

 PQS

 {

 maxQuadLengthsPerFrame = 0.03

 minLevel = 2

 maxLevel = 6

 minDetailDistance = 8

 {

 VertexColorMap

 {

 map = New\_Horizons/KopernicusFiles/NewHorizonPlanets/Ursula/Textures/Ursula\_color.dds

 order = 500

 enabled = true

 }

 VertexHeightMap

 {

 map = New\_Horizons/KopernicusFiles/NewHorizonPlanets/Ursula/PluginData/Ursula\_height.dds

 offset = 200

 deformity = 7500.0

 scaleDeformityByRadius = false

 order = 20

 enabled = true

 }

 VertexSimplexHeight

 {

 seed = 674624

 deformity = 1700

 persistence = 0.5

 frequency = 4

 enabled = true

 order = 21

 }

 VertexSimplexNoiseColor

 {

 seed = 45

 blend = 1.0

 colorEnd = 0,0,0,1

 octaves = 12.0

 persistence = 0.5

 enabled = true

 order = 200

 }

 AerialPerspectiveMaterial

 {

 globalDensity = -1E-05

 {

Thanks sdj64! You really helped me I always wanted to make my own systems and now I can. As soon as im off the curious george ranking im going to start making planet packs or maybe if I get the intelligence I may aswell make part mods, thanks again sdj64 you helped me in this endeavour.

its too bad no one has yet made an easy to find tutorial for kopernicus, i had to scrounge through tutorials like these trying to find things that still worked.
updated the OP with a hopefully clear warning to not use this anymore.
